name: Three-Cheese Cauliflower Casserole
author: jentrue
summary: I made this cheesy cauliflower dish for dinner one night when my husband was gone. It was so good the boys and I ended up not eating anything else but the casserole! I used fat-free milk and cream cheese and it turned out great!
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer
Add cauliflower, cover, and steam until fork-tender, 5 to 8 minutes
Meanwhile, beat cream cheese and milk together in a bowl
Stir in Parmesan and Cheddar cheeses
Mix bread crumbs and melted butter together in a small bowl
Transfer steamed cauliflower to a 2 1/2-quart casserole dish
Bake in the preheated oven until bubbly and browned, about 20 minutes
